note.p: Education: Matriculated Merton College Oxford (1744) but did not graduate
Career: Ordained (1777); Curate of Compton, Berkshire; Vicar of Froxfield, Wiltshire; 1st Mathematical Master, Royal Military Academy Woolwich (1799-1826)
References: M Croarken, 'Astronomical labourers: Maskelyne's assistants at the Royal Observatory, Greenwich, 1765 - 1811' in NR 2003 vol 57 pp 285 - 298
